name: Ramirez Retro
description: Ramirez Retro is a simple but fun retro style & unique running & jumping  mobile mixtape game ! Tap anywhere on the screen to make Ramirez jump once. Tap Twice for a 2nd Jump in Mid-Air. Avoid the chasing enemies by jumping onto or over crates but not into them, or the enemy will creep closer & closer. Ramirez Retro contains a very unique soundtrack featuring never before heard blends & remixes. Beat levels & save gorillas to unlock more remixes, character skins, & characters.Free the Gorillas from the enemy by making it the end of the level. Compete worldwide with the game center leaderboard & get game center achievements by beating each of the 10 levels in each zone . Thanks for supporting independent artists & gaming, & helping us create more! More Levels coming soon!
